author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF- Tokio Marine Holdings buys back 5.3 mln shares for 26.9 bln yen in February
text:
March 6(Reuters) - Tokio Marine Holdings Inc
* Says it bought back 5.3 million shares for 26.9 billion yen in total from Feb. 1 to Feb. 28
* Says this was part of the share repurchase plan announced on Nov. 17, 2017
* Says it accumulatively repurchased 15.2 million shares for 78.63 billion yen in total as of Feb. 28
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/2NQePR
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
